Package nl.vu.ip

Interface Summary
RemoteAdServer This is the remote interface of the AdServer.
 

Class Summary
Ad This class represents a single ad.
AdGet Application that is used to retrieve a single ad from the AdServer.
AdSend This application is used to purchase ad space.
AdServer This is the ad server.
BankClient This class is the interface to the bank server and uses sockets and the bank's own protocol to do money transfers and to verify earlier transfers.
BankPay  
Message This class represents a protocol message and implements the protocol's wire format.
PriceList This class contains the AdServer's price configuration.
 

Exception Summary
MarshalException This RuntimeException is thrown by the Message class when it is unable to serialize or deserialize a message.
NotPayedException This RuntimeException is thrown by the ad server's purchase() method when the client did not pay enough money.
